title: Charmed Life
description: Eric "Cat" is content living in the shadow of his sister, golden angelic Gwendolen Chant, the most promising young witch ever seen on Coven Street. The Tall Dark Stranger Chrestomanci shares his Castle home with the orphans, but the household Family do not bow to Gwen's talents, and she brews trouble that threatens more worlds than their own.
author: Diana Wynne Jones
